channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
Hey,
I just started to understand how Reflection cheat client works and I have added some commands but still doesn't fully understand them.
How I example can create command what thieves from thieving stall ? and is it possible to make it so I can say thieve it x100 times?
Any help? :)

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @ruupe ruupe
item.description:
@ruupe wrote:

Kiryn:

I think it would be a bad idea to make it loop. Most thieving stalls do damage randomly. and if youre in a loop you’ll die

In this server you get items to your inventory which you can use to object. So it would be perfect if I get command what clicks the thieving stall x28 and then the other object x28 times.

Read full topic
